chunks.text: Got to take the time to take a look around us at
White is yours and wide as mine.
Now's the time to run away, the country you'll discover.
Find a place you'll never see.
Share it, share, share, you got to share it with each other.
Share it, share, share, you've got to share it with each other.
There's nowhere on this mother earth.
You've got to get up now, go there, make it last forever. New Zealand is yours.
Share it, share it with each other.

text: We're in God's own country. Got to take the time to take a look around us at White is yours and wide as mine. Now's the time to run away, the country you'll discover. Find a place you'll never see. Share it with each other. Share it, share, share, you got to share it with each other. Share it, share, share, you've got to share it with each other. There's nowhere on this mother earth. It's got so much together. You've got to get up now, go there, make it last forever. New Zealand is yours. Share it, share it with each other. New Zealand is yours. Go there now.
